    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112675</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112675</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">In the Classroom - Word Knowledge 2</string>
            <string language="en">In the Classroom - Word Knowledge 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Im Klassenzimmer - Wort-Wissen 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la salle de classe - la connaissance 2 de 
mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na sala de aula - conhecimento 2 da palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nell'aula - conoscenza 2 di parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στην τάξη - γνώση 2 του Word</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En la sala de clase - conocimiento 2 de la 
palabra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this drag’n’drop exercise you can check if you have learned the words in the previous exercise, In the Classroom - Word Knowledge 1.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">In this drag'n'drop exercise you can check if you have learned the words in the previous exercise, In the Classroom - Word Knowledge 1. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">school</string>
            <string language="sv">education</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">school</string>
            <string language="en">education</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser drag'n'drop Übung können Sie, ob Sie 
die Wörter in der vorhergehenden Übung erlernt haben, in das 
Klassenzimmer überprüfen - fassen Sie Wissen 1 ab. Safir - 
Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 6 - was wurden Sie 
mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice de drag'n'drop vous pouvez 
contrôler si vous avez appris les mots dans l'exercice précédent, 
dans la salle de classe - exprimez la connaissance 1. Safir - 
l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 6 - que 
aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício do drag'n'drop você pode 
verificar se você aprender as palavras no exercício precedente, na 
sala de aula - exprima o conhecimento 1. Safir - vida do inglês
e de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione del drag'n'drop potete 
controllare se avete imparato le parole nell'esercitazione precedente,
nell'aula - esprima la conoscenza 1. Safir - inglese e vita 
attiva per i principianti - modulo 6 - che cosa gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση drag'n'drop εσείς μπορεί να 
ελέγξει εάν έχετε μάθει τις λέξεις στην προηγούμενη άσκηση, 
στην τάξη - γνώση 1. του Word αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή 
ζωή Safir - για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 6 - τι θα θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio del drag'n'drop usted puede 
controlar si usted ha aprendido las palabras en el ejercicio anterior,
en la sala de clase - redacte el conocimiento 1. ¿Safir - 
inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 6 - qué  
usted tiene gusto?</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
